title: Watch Sky News主持被問 英國警察會否就荃灣事件開槍，表示絕不會，打中國駐英大使嘴臉

replies.msg:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zg_YUu2JzEA
由 29Days 20H 27M 12S 開始

以下係字幕：（Chinese Ambassador to the UK= CA；Host= H）（先英後中字幕）

CA: President Xi said, we should consolidate our achievement, we should develop our country well. That is a fundamental task in front of the leadership, in front of the Chinese people. China has been a victim, as said, foreign invasion, aggression bullying, humiliation. We certainly will never ever transfer this to the other countries.

H: Well you mentioned that, but then we've seen this scene in Hong Kong today. You know, we've been reporting as you heard there let's have a little look at it. One of the protestors today been shot at a very close rage in the chest. People saying, well, this Chinese crackdown isn't showing a respect for civil rights

CA: I can't agree with you to describe what happened in Hong Kong is not a crackdown at all. We strongly condemn the violent rioters. You know this violence has been going on several months. It challenged the bottom line of One Country Two System. It challenged the rule of laws in country. It brought damages...

H: Why not engage one whole talks and discuss some of the democratic demands of the protestors?

CA: No. You have to separate peace demonstration from violent rioters. You talked about the police used a live ammunition because there life was in serious threat. You know, this rioter who have been shot on left shoulder is the one who used iron club to attack police. So I would ask what happened if the same little things happen in UK. What would be a response of British Police in responding in such rioters such violence?

H: Well, we wouldn't shoot an unarmed protestor with allow with a weapon

CA: If a life was in serious threat

H: In the main of British police are not

CA: (......) No, I don't think so, I don't think so. What..How the British police would response one the Westminster Hall was stormed by rioters. You know, I think we should condemn the violence. Hong Kong is based on the rule of laws. I think rule of laws, One Country Two System can ensure the future of Hong Kong.

H: But can you tell me then if these protests continue, they continue to escalate in terms of violence and there is no doubt there is extreme violence on both sides. There are violence would be used by the authorities.

CA: I do hope things will calm down

H: I think NOT

（中文字幕）（中國駐英國大使= 中使；主持人= 主）

中使：習主席講過，我地應該鞏固我地嘅成就、好好咁發展中國。呢個係中國領導層上、中國人民上係最基礎嘅任務。好似前面咁講，因為中國一直都係受害者嘅角色，受到外侵、欺凌、侮辱。我地中國當然唔會將呢啲轉移去其他國家

主：嗱，你就講到咁，我地睇到今日個香港嘅畫面，你知啦，我地一直都有報導香港嘅事情就好似你聽過嘅咁，我地黎睇睇。 [播片]。今日有個示威者被近距離射擊而中槍，係正心口。啲人話，咁樣嘅中國式鎮壓唔係尊重緊人權喎

中使：我唔同意你對香港嘅描述講法，根本都唔係鎮壓。我地強烈譴責啲暴徒。你知啦，呢啲暴力已經持續左幾個月。咁樣係挑戰一國兩制嘅底線、國家嘅法治。帶來損傷⋯⋯

主：咁點解唔整個對話去傾下有邊啲示威者所提出民主嘅訴求係可以達成？

中使：不，你一定要同啲暴徒割蓆。你條片講到警察用實彈係因為佢地受到生命威脅。你都見到個左邊肩膊中彈嘅暴徒用鐵造球棒去打警察。嗱，咁我又會問，如果同樣事件發生係英國，啲英國警察會點應對啲暴徒？

主：嗯，我地唔會亦都唔容許用槍去射無武裝嘅示威者

中使：如果生命受到嚴重威脅呢？

主：大部分嘅英國警察唔會

中使：（呆左兩秒）唔會囉，我唔覺得係囉，咁…咁啲英國警察會點去應對啲暴徒去破壞英國國會議事廳啊？你知啦，我地應該去譴責暴力，而香港係建基於法治。我覺得法治同一國兩制係可以確保香港嘅未來。

主：咁你可唔可以話我知如果呢啲示威持續，雙方會升級武力，毫無疑問兩邊都用緊極端武力，而政府機關又可能會使用暴力？

中使：我真係希望事情能夠平靜落黎

主：我唔覺得會
